help_how_to_update_shortcuts_question.message: How do I update the keyboard shortcuts mapping for the different sorting methods?

help_how_to_update_shortcuts_answer.message: The extension comes with predefined shortcuts for some of the proposed sorting methods. You can change them via Firefox directly. For more information, see: Manage extension shortcuts in Firefox

help_mru_not_working_chrome_question.message: Sort by most recently used do not work on Chrome.

help_mru_not_working_chrome_answer.message: Indeed, this feature is not available on Chrome.

help_encountered_a_problem_answer.message: Please create an issue on GitHub
